means: 卡拉卡尔帕克人，卡拉卡尔帕克语

PerfectNetExp.abs: karajz 考劳伊兹, karakalpak 卡拉卡尔帕克, karak 卡拉克

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a Turkic people living near Lake Aral in central Asia
2. the Turkic language spoken by the Karakalpak people

auth_sentence.content: He began his collection, now housed in the Karakalpak Museum of Art in Nukus, near the ancient Silk Road, in the late 1960s.
auth_sentence.res_content: He began his collection, now housed in the Karakalpak Museum of Art in Nukus, near the ancient Silk Road, in the late 1960s.
